item.title: Main menu
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

hey, i have just been trying to fix this for the past half an hour, but i cant seem to get it. can anyone help me out?

endQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@gre@Welcome to LeetOwnage-PK server!", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@cya@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@yel@ Anyone caught constantly massing, Will be kicked, if proceeded, BANNED", 8148); sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150); sendQuest("@blu@===Your pk stats===", 8151); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills = "+killcount, 8152); sendQuest("@red@Pk Points = "+pkpoints, 8153); sendQuest("@red@Death Count = "+deathcount, 8154); sendQuest("@cya@For a list of commands, type ::commands",); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

and when i go to compile, at says this:

client.java:6735: illegal start of expression sendQuest("@cya@for a list of commands, type ::commands",); ^ 1error files compiled successfully!
